Header: Medvedev into Japan Open final after sweeping aside Shapovalov
Content: Daniil Medvedev of Russia eased into the final of the Japan Open in Tokyo with a 6-3 6-3 win over Canadian Denis Shapovalov.Medvedev is ranked 32 on the ATP rankings, just one below Shapovalov, but the Russian dominated the match with two breaks of serve in the first set and another in the second, wrapping up the match after just 65 minutes.Medvedev will face either Japan’s Kei Nishikori or Richard Gasquet of France in Sunday’s final.
